metadata.title: How to Add YouTube End Screens 2025: Complete Guide
metadata.description: Learn to add end screens to YouTube videos. Promote videos, playlists, and drive subscribers.

hero.headline: How to Add End Screens to YouTube Videos
hero.subheadline: Keep viewers watching. End screens drive views to more content.

sections.content: End screens appear in the final 5-20 seconds of your video. They can promote other videos, playlists, channels, or encourage subscriptions. Effective end screens significantly increase session time and subscriber growth. Here's how to set them up.

sections.title: Adding End Screens
content: Choose element type (video, playlist, subscribe, etc.)

content.title: Video
content.description: Your videos or best for viewer. Most clicked element type.

content.title: Playlist
content.description: Drive viewers into a series. Increases session time.

content.title: Subscribe
content.description: One-click subscribe button. Good for call-to-action.

content.title: Design Space
content.description: Leave clear area in video for end screen elements. Don't cover important content.

content.title: Verbal CTA
content.description: Tell viewers to click. 'Check out this video' increases clicks significantly.

content.title: Relevant Content
content.description: 'Best for viewer' often outperforms specific videos. Test both.

sections.title: End Screen Strategy
content: Design outro graphics with clear space
Test 'Best for viewer' vs specific video

faq.question: How long should end screens be?
faq.answer: 15-20 seconds is ideal. Long enough to give viewers time to click, not so long it feels padded. Minimum 5 seconds available.

faq.question: Best for viewer vs specific video?
faq.answer: 'Best for viewer' uses YouTube's algorithm to suggest personalized content. Often gets more clicks. Test against your specific video picks.

faq.question: Why can't I add end screens?
faq.answer: Video must be at least 25 seconds long. Some videos with content restrictions may not allow end screens. Check Studio for specific issues.

faq.question: Do end screens affect watch time?
faq.answer: They can decrease percentage watched (people click away early) but increase session time (they watch more videos). Net positive for channel.
